attributes.action: We want local elections in 2025 not to be cancelled
attributes.additional_details:
Local elections are a fundamental part of our democratic system, allowing communities to choose their representatives, hold local authorities accountable, and have a say in decisions that affect their daily lives. Any attempt to cancel or delay these elections without a justifiable reason undermines democratic principles and erodes public trust.

We believe:

Local democracy must be protected – Elections ensure that councils represent the will of the people. Cancelling them denies citizens their voice.

Accountability matters – Local leaders must answer to the public. Delaying elections allows unaccountable officials to remain in power.

There is no valid excuse – If national elections can take place, there is no reason why local elections should be cancelled.
attributes.background: We urge the government to respect the democratic process and allow local elections to proceed as scheduled. Any attempt to interfere with the electoral process is a attack on our rights as citizens of this country

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: 

Do not postpone the local elections

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/710155
